title: Party in the USA by Miley Cyrus is the best song ever
body: Change my mind. She is a queen of music!

title: The best song ever is Best Song Ever by One Direction
body: One Direction is the only direction I want to move in. It's their way or the highway!

title: The ultimate rock anthem of all time is Welcome to the Black Parade by My Chemical Romance
body: One Direction is the only direction I want to move in. It's their way or the highway!
